article_title: The Gun Question: Why is gun ownership inquiry showing up on routine patient history paperwork?

article_metadata.author:
Rachael Van Horn
Staff Writer

og.description: Editor's note; Over the last four weeks, reporter Rachael Van Horn has been doing research into why some local physicians offices and hospitals now include a question about gun ownership.
